feed.title: Google Cloud: Policy Intelligence
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Policy Intelligence

entry.content: The issue that caused IAM recommender role recommendations to be inaccurate and out of date is fixed.
entry.summary: The issue causing inaccurate and outdated IAM role recommendations has been resolved.
entry.title: Fixed: IAM role recommendations are accurate again

entry.content: You can use Policy Troubleshooter to remediate access issues. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Remediate access issues with Policy Troubleshooter, now in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Policy Troubleshooter

entry.content: Due to an ongoing issue, IAM recommender role recommendations might be out of date and inaccurate. Removing roles or permissions can break existing processes. Therefore, please validate usage before applying any changes.
entry.summary: IAM role recommendations might be out of date due to an ongoing issue. Please validate usage before applying any changes, as removing roles or permissions can break existing processes.
entry.title: Issue: IAM role recommendations may be inaccurate

entry.content: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy is now generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy is now generally available. This feature allows you to test your organization policies.
entry.title: Feature: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy Now Generally Available
